tables.name: phame_demographic
tables.schema: (patid:int32, age_cat:char(1), gender:char(1), race:char(1), ethnicity:char(1), zip:char(5), payer_primary:char(1), payer_secondary:char(1))

tables.name: phame_diagnosis
tables.schema: (patid:int32, dx_diabetes:bool, dx_hypertension:bool, dx_cervical_cancer:bool, dx_breast_cancer:bool, dx_lung_cancer:bool, dx_colorectal_cancer:bool)

tables.name: phame_diagnosis_rollup
tables.schema: (age_cat:char(1), gender:char(1), race:char(1), ethnicity:char(1), zip:char(5), payer_primary:char(1), payer_secondary:char(1), patient_cnt:int64, diabetes_cnt:int64, hypertension_cnt:int64, cervical_cancer_cnt:int64, breast_cancer_cnt:int64, lung_cancer_cnt:int64, colorectal_cancer_cnt:int64)
